<?php
ob_start();
require_once '/wordpress/wp-load.php';
ob_end_clean();

// Set 'Events Block' as homepage
$page = get_page_by_title('Events Block Demo');
if ($page) {
  update_option('show_on_front', 'page');
  update_option('page_on_front', $page->ID);
  echo "✅ 'Events Block Demo' page set as homepage.";
} else {
  echo "❌ 'Events Block Demo' page not found.";
}
